◆ AddPoints()

void tsa::FifoBuffer::AddPoints ( Dmatrix &  data,
double  scale,
int  n = 0,
int  offset = 0 
)

Insert in the back of the buffer n data contained in a matrix, starting from a given offset. If n = 0 (default) all the data starting from the offset are copied.

Parameters
datathe matrix containing the data that must be inserted in the buffer
nthe number of data to insert
offsetthe offset of the data to insert
